title: Families First Coronavirus Response Act Notice Must Be Posted or Distributed by April 1
description: The Families First Coronavirus Response Act (FFCRA) was recently passed to provide paid sick leave and expanded family and medical leave to certain eligible workers for specified reasons related to COVID-19. The FFCRA goes into effect April 1. This means that those employers with less than 500 employees must comply with the notice provisions of the FFCRA by April 1.
